Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Orchestrates the game loop and coordinates between the board, view, and game logic. Handles input events, manages game state (countdown, clearing, game over), and implements special game mode logic (Time Attack, Puzzle mode win conditions).

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c, Board board, SoundController soundController, GameMode gameMode)
      Constructs a GameController with default player name "GUEST".
      Parameters:
      c - The GUI controller for view updates
      board - The game board instance
      soundController - The sound controller for audio feedback
      gameMode - The game mode to play

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c, Board board, SoundController soundController, GameMode gameMode, String playerName)
      Constructs a GameController with specified player name. Initializes the game, sets up event listeners, and configures game mode-specific features.
      Parameters:
      c - The GUI controller for view updates
      board - The game board instance
      soundController - The sound controller for audio feedback
      gameMode - The game mode to play
      playerName - The name of the player

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles downward movement events (soft drop). Applies scoring for user-initiated drops and triggers brick landing if movement fails.
      Specified by:
      onDownEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing clear row information and updated view data

      Returns:
      Updated view data after the move

    • onHardDropEvent

      public DownData onHardDropEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles hard drop events (instant drop to bottom). Applies scoring based on drop distance and triggers brick landing.
      Specified by:
      onHardDropEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing clear row information and updated view data

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame()
      Resets the game and starts a new one. Reinitializes game mode-specific features and shows countdown.
      Specified by:
      createNewGame in interface InputEventListener

    • handleBrickLanding

      private ClearRow handleBrickLanding()
      Handles the logic when a brick lands and merges with the board. Checks for line clears, applies combo system, triggers animations, and spawns new brick.
      Returns:
      ClearRow object containing information about cleared rows

    • updateScoreOnUserSoftDrop

      private void updateScoreOnUserSoftDrop(MoveEvent event)
      Updates score for user-initiated soft drops.
      Parameters:
      event - The move event to process

    • initializeTimeAttackMode

      private void initializeTimeAttackMode()
      Initializes Time Attack mode with random time limit and target score. Sets up a timer that counts down and checks win/loss conditions.

    • checkWinCondition

      private void checkWinCondition(int currentScore)
      Checks if the win condition for Time Attack mode has been met.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - The current score to check against the target

      private void checkLossCondition()
